bibl.title: Early Greek Lyric and Hellenistic Epigram: New Evidence from Recently Published Papyri.
bibl.note: Shows how the texts of Greek and Hellenistic epigram edited recently have influenced the scholarly debate and to what extent they enriched, or even changed our understanding of these. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 27th International Congress of Papyrology Warsaw, 29 July - 3 August 2013.

bibl.seg: Jerzy Danielewicz, Early Greek Lyric and Hellenistic Epigram: New Evidence from Recently Published Papyri.
Papyrology AD 2013. 27th International Congress of Papyrology. Keynote Papers = JJurP 43 (2013) pp. 263-275; - 434.

Shows how the texts of Greek and Hellenistic epigram edited recently have influenced the scholarly debate and to what extent they enriched, or even changed our understanding of these. - Avec résumé en anglais.
